Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: One of the best kebab you can find in Amsterdam. Even the wrap itself is made from fresh dough. This is a take away only place. The two staff members working there are very friendly and focused.

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: The best broodje doner of the city. Crunchy bread and a lot of meat...always comes with salad and sauces on the side. Really always in time...10-15-20 minutes waiting, and i order from them since 2 years with friends. Really give it a try..delicious

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: Always really good, the driver Tanger is a thunder! Great!

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: The two pizzas I ordered are simply the worst pizzas I've ever eaten in my life. This is why I'm leaving the review. The dough was absolutely disgusting. I couldn't eat more than 2 slices. Biggest waste of 20+ euro. The baqlawa also tasted gross. The order also took 65 minutes to arrive.

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: Set a large order of pizza and chips, with drinks, in around 10:45pm to be delivered to The Alfred Hotel. It said that the order would be arrived at around 11:30pm and we had left our contact information and ushered them to call when â€¦

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: I work in a hotel. First time I order and it was really good. They forgot to bring my cola so I called them and they brought me my cola + a little dessert as an apologize. Lovely!

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: 31 September. 2 hours and still waiting for the order.. and I'm also regular customer!!!! not the first time, but that can happened! but not this often! After this time never again!

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: Food was very dry. We didn't get Coca cola with our meal. I don't know how this place got so nice review, but it was very cheap street food for us

Name: Smulhoek
Review Text: Great, simple food, prepared the right way at a good price. Friendly people. Live close by, this is my go-to place of choice!
